channel.title: Skuller PK
channel.description:
[center][img]http://skullerpk.co.cc/uploads/U2-1267913006.png[/img][/center]
Hey there, I'm Alex, one of the main owners of Skuller PK. When it comes to development, I manage everything related to the website, and Parker, handles server related development and everything of that sort. Despite our success thus far, we're on the lookout for some people that will be willing to help with server development. The positions we need filled are listed below.
Source coder - (One) Client coder - (One) Graphic designer - (One - Two)
The source coder and client coder are self explanatory, however, the graphic designer(s) will be people that are very good with computer artwork; Photoshop, GIMP, etc.. They will be the ones who can create logos, promotional banners, etc. for Skuller PK at a moments notice.
Note - While applying for graphic designer, you are required to provide some of your works.
If you're interested in applying, please follow this format. Applications that do not follow the required format will be ignored: [code]Name: Age: You're applying for: Experience (Works for those who are applying to be graphic designers): What's the best way to contact you?: Why should we choose you?[/code]
Some of the rather uninteresting pictures of the Skuller PK server are below. (I'll take some exciting screen shots at a later time)
[img]http://skullerpk.co.cc/uploads/U2-1267743020.jpg[/img] [img]http://skullerpk.co.cc/uploads/U2-1267742631.jpg[/img] [img]http://skullerpk.co.cc/uploads/U2-1267742703.jpg[/img] [img]http://skullerpk.co.cc/uploads/U2-1267742782.jpg[/img] [img]http://skullerpk.co.cc/uploads/U2-1267742857.jpg[/img] [img]http://skullerpk.co.cc/uploads/U2-1267742912.jpg[/img] [img]http://skullerpk.co.cc/uploads/U2-1267742969.jpg[/img] [img]http://skullerpk.co.cc/uploads/U2-1267742992.jpg[/img]
Some of the server features are listed below.
[b][u]Server Features[/b] Features - Fight Pits. - Jad Minigame. - Duel Arena. - Castle Wars. - Pest Control. - Barrows. - Assault. - Runescape Sounds. - Quests. - Ancient Magic. - Lunar Magic. - Normal Magic. - Interface Smithing. - Clan Chat. - Clan Chat Ranks.
[b][u]About Skuller PK's website[/b] - Hosted on an unlimited web hosting package from Host Gator. - Secure and protected from attacks. - Has a .Com domain for a professional look (lol). - Developed with fully licensed Invision Power Board software. - Tons of helpful modifications added; Integrated image upload, and many others! - Organized - Organization is key to presenting a website in a professional manner.
Still interested? Well don't wait any longer, post an application!
You can contact me via MSN - Alex.amayzing@hotmail.com

item.title: Skuller PK
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

Java Is So Cool:

Shut up Andrew, you were right Alex, you’re new project is much better then your old leeched DeltaScape server.

A lot better, and we’re still working really hard on it.

In fact, I’ve demoted Anvice14 and have gotten a new coder/co-owner, whatever you’d like to call him. Parker, the owner of Yanile, I’m sure you’ve heard of it, and I wouldn’t be surprised if you hate it.

Andrew, don’t tell me to get a life, get a life yourself. All I see on the Moparscape forums is flame from you. All you did is sit at your computer and wait for threads to be posted on Mopar for you to bash someone on, that sir, is not a good life.

Read full topic

item.title: Skuller PK
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

oldstones:

lol yea I’m mad over a game think again… you just fail take all credits !!! whatever gl luck with your failed project lmao pce.[/quote][quote=“oldstones, post:4, topic:333901”]lol yea I’m mad over a game think again… you just fail take all credits !!! whatever gl luck with your failed project lmao pce.

If I took all of the credits, you wouldn’t see Anvice14’s name up there in the information. Him and I work well together and I’m perfectly fine with giving people credits. Failed project? If you call a community attracting 1,000 registered members and a server that has 50+ players on at all times failed, then yes, Skuller PK has failed. Thanks for your good luck wishes.

Read full topic

[center][/center]

Hey there, I’m Alex, one of the main owners of Skuller PK. When it comes to development, I manage everything related to the website, and Parker, handles server related development and everything of that sort. Despite our success thus far, we’re on the lookout for some people that will be willing to help with server development. The positions we need filled are listed below.

Source coder - (One)

Name: Age: You're applying for: Experience (Works for those who are applying to be graphic designers): What's the best way to contact you?: Why should we choose you?

Some of the rather uninteresting pictures of the Skuller PK server are below. (I’ll take some exciting screen shots at a later time)








Some of the server features are listed below.

[u]Server Features
